page.title: 15RECREATION IN CHIRNSIDE
page.content: For the children there are a Youth Club, where they play table tennis, pool and other games, the Cubs and the Brownies. The Army Cadet Force also meets in the village. There is a boxing club for boys aged 10 and over. They train twice a week at the community centre and enter local competitions. They have their own boxing ring and punch bags. Chirnside has a bowling club and a football team. There is a tennis court. During the winter there are carpet bowls, darts, pool, dominoes and whist. For the keen gardeners there are the Horticultural Society and the Onion Club, which have annual shows. There is a Mothers and Toddlers Group for pre-school children. For a small village Chirnside offers a wide range of activities.
